p: Laboratory investigations show that this virus strain was not related to the HPAI H5N1 “Asian” virus strain that emerged in Southeast Asia in the mid-1990s and entered the EU in 2005. The virus strain detected in France is of European origin. 27 This means that H5N1 has been mutating. The “right” combination of mutations will result in the virus becoming efficiently airborne and capable of human-to-human transmission.
